description: To remove shipping containers from 142-144 Picton Road; use first floor of 142A Picton Road for administration purposes; erect a single storey building (width no greater than 8.8m, depth for Picton Road no greater than 9.3m, height at Picton Road no greater than 5.6m including pitched roof) erect a steel fence to the eastern and southern boundaries of 142-144 Picton Road; use new building and open space to the rear for storage of tool hire equipment with access from 142A Picton Road; use 3-5 Bishopgate Street as a parking area (outline application).
site_address: 142A, 142-144 Picton Road, 3-5 Bishopgate Street, Liverpool, L15 4LJ
